rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: A quiet terminal lounge. Broken LED panels flicker with old welcome messages. The reception kiosk blinks idly.

lore.name: DevCorpse42
lore.description: The shriveled remains of a systems engineer. ID badge melted into neck.
logs: [log-0x04]: CPU temps climbing. Power loop unstable.
[log-0x05]: CoreDaemon not responding... shutting it down manually.

lore.name: Melted I/O Port
lore.description: A deformed I/O socket. It's humming.

rooms.name: IT Wing
rooms.description: Rows of towering server racks, most dark. A faint burning smell. The hum of unstable power grows louder here.

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description: Crushed coffee pods, cracked mugs, and half-eaten snacks. A corkboard holds forgotten coupons and mysterious notes.

rooms.name: Dev Dungeon
rooms.description: Dark and damp. Abandoned workstations run ancient builds. Shadowy figures hover over old commit logs.

rooms.name: Cold Storage
rooms.description: Frost clings to the server enclosures. Legacy tapes and sealed drives sit silently. Everything smells like old bytes.

rooms.name: Power Plant
rooms.description: Arcs of electricity snap between busbars. The main generator whirs with fluctuating intensity. A shadow shifts in the sparks.

rooms.name: The DMZ
rooms.description: A glowing mesh of network firewalls, routing tables, and traffic shaping daemons. The air smells like scorched JSON.

rooms.name: DataCore
rooms.description: Everything is quiet. The CoreRouter floats mid-air, humming like a heart. Cables hang like neural pathways. Old Root waits.

quests.name: Fix the IT Disaster
quests.description: Defeat the overheating server and report back to Clara.

steps.description: Talk to Clara in the Lobby

quests.name: Obtain the Sudo Token
quests.description: Convince DevGhost42 to give up the compressed sudo token.

steps.description: Talk to DevGhost42 in the Dev Dungeon

quests.name: Restore Backup Access
quests.description: Recover cryo storage credentials from Cold Storage.

quests.name: Restart the Power Plant
quests.description: Defeat Kernel Panik and reroute emergency power.

quests.name: Gain DMZ Clearance
quests.description: Convince ARC Agent to trust you and enter the DMZ.

quests.name: Activate the CoreRouter
quests.description: Defeat the CoreDaemon and speak to Old Root to decide the fate of the system.

items.name: Cooling Gel Pack
items.description: Cools overheating server nodes. Restores 15 HP.

items.name: Serverness 10% Coupon
items.description: A faded printout that still works. 10% off your next deployment.

items.name: USB of Forgotten Build
items.description: Contains half-finished unit tests from 2011. Might be useful to someone.

items.name: Cryo Disk
items.description: A frozen storage platter with legacy AI backups. Still reads NTFS.

items.name: Encrypted Credentials
items.description: Old backup access keys in an unknown format. You’ll need these.

items.name: Compressed Sudo Token
items.description: Highly compressed admin powers. Use wisely.

items.name: Firewall Rule Exception
items.description: Punches a temporary hole through DMZ restrictions.

items.name: ARC Network Badge
items.description: Authentication token recognized by deep DMZ routers.

items.name: Core Activation Key
items.description: A shimmering shard with root-level clearance. Final step required.

enemies.name: Overheating Server
enemies.description: A half-melted 2U rack unit throwing sparks and screaming in syslogs.

enemies.name: CI Specter
enemies.description: An endless ghost loop of failing builds, haunting DevOps for eternity.

enemies.name: Kernel Panik
enemies.description: It howls with stack traces and emits high-voltage coredumps.

enemies.name: Blackhole Switch
enemies.description: It routes all hope to /dev/null. Its ports bend light.

enemies.name: CoreDaemon
enemies.description: The last guardian of Serverness Core. It speaks in raw opcodes.

npcs.name: Receptionist Clara
npcs.dialogue: Please, something's wrong in the IT Wing — it’s burning up again!

npcs.name: Intern Kyle
npcs.dialogue: Nobody told me the server room would be haunted. I'm not paid enough for this.

npcs.name: DevGhost42
npcs.dialogue: I won't give up my sudo token... not until the build loop ends.

npcs.name: ARC Agent
npcs.dialogue: Clearance required. If you prove trustworthy, I may let you through.

npcs.name: Old Root
npcs.dialogue: You’ve come far. Are you sure you want to reactivate the Core?
